attributes.action: If England reach the euros finals lift the restrictions for pubs
attributes.background: Lift the restrictions for the euros finals if England make it so more people can go to the pub as we haven't made a major final since 1966 and it would be great for the country to be able to celebrate something together

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want restrictions on pubs to be eased if England reach the Euro finals, but it's not clear if you want the Government to change Sunday restrictions on pub opening hours, lift Covid-19 restrictions, both, or something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

It has been reported that the Government has said licensing laws are to be relaxed to allow pubs to stay open later for Sunday's Euro 2020 final: https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-57736417
